claim: the bosse field be use the most used venue
resp:
1. Identify the venues mentioned in the table. The venues are Bosse Field, Goebel Soccer Complex, Roberts Municipal Stadium, Reitz Bowl.
2. Count the number of times each venue is associated with a team that played football. This will help us understand which venue was used most frequently for football matches.
3. In the table, Bosse Field is associated with only one team (Evansville Crimson Giants) and the time period they played is from 1921 - 1922. Goebel Soccer Complex has been associated with three different teams: Evansville Vipers (2000-2007), Evansville Bluecats (2003-2007), and Evansville Express (2004-2005). Roberts Municipal Stadium was used by one team, Evansville Bluecats, between 2003-2007. Reitz Bowl is associated with only one team, Ohio River Bearcats, from 2008 - 2010.
4. Since Bosse Field has the least number of teams that played football there compared to other venues in the table, it follows that Bosse Field was used the least frequently for football matches (as compared to the other venues mentioned).
5. Therefore, the claim "the bosse field be use the most used venue" is FALSE.
